alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Kossuth; Winnebago; Worth (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 12 at 7:41PM CDT until April 12 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Worth County in north central Iowa... East central Kossuth County in north central Iowa... Northwestern Hancock County in north central Iowa... Winnebago County in north central Iowa... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 741 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles east of Union Slogh, or 15 miles west of Forest City, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lake Mills and Emmons. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 212 and 215. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for north central Iowa.
